HTMLAttributesRelMe.summary: The me keyword for the rel attribute of the link and a elements indicates that the current resource is represented by the linked party. The me value was introduced in the XHTML Friends Network (XFN) specification.

remarks.para: The rel="me" attribute is used in RelMeAuth and Web sign in specifications as a way to enable a person to identify themselves to a web service using their domain name or a particular URL.
